reviewText: Missed important aspect of the history ... Reyes family ... interesting but misses the target as a documentary, needed more research.

If you want to know a little history about the town you live in, or don't live in, this is an interesting part of the beginning of Los Angeles and particularly Santa Monica and the Pacific Palisades .  This is one family's quest to save their family cemetery and their part in the evolution of Los Angeles.

I loved the documentary it's wonderful
history of the Santa Monica Canyon.
The old footage and photos are spectacular. Ernest Marquez is a iconic
Historian and is wonderful in this documentary .
